mapper.sql: id, coupon_id, customer_id, coupon_code, customer_name, receive_type, create_time, use_status, use_time, order_id, order_no
mapper.select: SELECT cc.*, c.id c_id, c.type c_type, c.name c_name, c.totalNum c_totalNum, c.amount c_amount, c.receive_num_limit c_receive_num_limit, c.use_condition_type c_use_condition_type, c.use_condition_limit c_use_condition_limit, c.start_effect_time c_start_effect_time, c.end_effect_time c_end_effect_time, c.scope_type c_scope_type, c.note c_note, c.publish_num c_publish_num, c.use_num c_use_num, c.receive_num c_receive_num, c.enable_time c_enable_time, c.coupon_code c_coupon_code, cs.id cs_id,cs.spu_id cs_spu_id, ci.id ci_id,ci.item_id ci_item_id FROM coupon_customer cc LEFT JOIN coupon c ON cc.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN coupon_spu cs ON cs.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN coupon_item ci ON ci.coupon_id = c.id WHERE cc.customer_id = #{customerId} AND cc.use_status = 0
mapper.update: update coupon_customer set use_status = #{useStatus}, use_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where customer_id = #{customerId} and coupon_id = #{couponId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from coupon_customer where customer_id = #{customerId} and coupon_id = #{couponId}
